messages.subject: Re: graph/counting
messages.messageBody:
<<<<All,

I am looking for a graph that a child that is learning
to count would fill in the numbers. I have seen it,
but can't remember the link. This would be printable.

Linda>>>>

How about making one out of large grid graph paper or
ordinary paper and a ruler? Also for mathy type games
and ideas (and also reproducible graph paper sheets,
etc.) the book "Family Math" can't be beat, IMHO.

Meghan :-)

messages.messageBody:
Linda,
I joined this group about a week ago. If they don't have what you are
looking for ine file or bookmark section they will find it,(or anything
else), for you.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/homeschoolingprintables

I have found some really cool printables there and the people are VERY nice!
Indiana Tami

Linda
